/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, adding a touch of urban greenery to the scene. Vehicles, including cars and buses, are scattered across the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various colors of the vehicles and buildings.
